headline: Chicken Jambalaya
name: Chicken Jambalaya
description: This chicken jambalaya recipe is packed with vegetables and a zippy tomato broth. It's a spicy chicken-and-rice dish with a potent change of pace.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add celery, onion, and green bell pepper; sauté until tender. Stir in tomatoes, broth, rice, thyme or basil, garlic salt, ground black pepper, hot pepper sauce, and bay leaf.
Bring all to a boil; reduce heat, cover skillet and simmer for about 20 minutes or until rice is tender. Stir in cooked chicken and cook until heated through. Discard bay leaf and serve hot.
